name: EUDET/AIDA Pixel Beam Telescopes
body:
This page collects all helpful references and documentation for the EUDET/AIDA-family of pixel beam telescopes based on Mimosa-sensors.

## Telescope Hardware
[Telescope TWiki pages](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/MimosaTelescope/WebHome)

## DAQ and Analysis Software

### EUDAQ
a generic data acquisition framework

[Download and instructions](http://eudaq.github.io/)
[Source Code](https://github.com/eudaq/eudaq)


### EUTelescope
A generic pixel telescope data analysis framework

[Documentation and support](http://eutelescope.web.cern.ch/)
[Source Code](https://github.com/eutelescope/eutelescope)

## Further References

### EUDET Project
[EUDET JRA1 Website](http://www.eudet.org/e13/e21/)
### AIDA Project
[AIDA Website](http://aida.web.cern.ch/aida/index.html)
### DESY-II Test Beam Facility
[Website](http://testbeam.desy.de/)
### Support or Contact
Please check out the above pages for documentation and support contacts for the corresponding telescope component.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
